[[File:J. A. Bayona.jpg|thumb|200px|''J. A. Bayona'' in 2016]]
'''Juan Antonio García Bayona''' ([[9 May|May 9]], [[1975]]) is a Spanish director. He directed the first two episodes of he first season of the ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power‎]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=Nellie Andreeva |articleurl=https://deadline.com/2019/07/the-lord-of-the-rings-j-a-bayona-direct-amazon-series-juan-antonio-bayona-1202640048/|articlename=
‘The Lord Of The Rings’: J.A. Bayona To Direct Amazon Series
|dated=03 July 2019|website=Deadline|accessed=14 March 2021}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=Aaron Couch |articleurl=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/live-feed/lord-rings-series-enlists-jurassic-world-filmmaker-ja-bayona-1222499|articlename=
Amazon's 'Lord of the Rings' Series Enlists 'Jurassic World' Filmmaker J.A. Bayona
|dated=03 December 2020|website=Deadline|accessed=14 March 2021}}</ref>
